test.name: test_EmptyCmdLine
test.output:
usage: setup.py [options] <command> [command options]
I18NToolBox is intented to provide some centralized helper function for gettext translatable strings extraction and compilation.
options: --version show program's version number and exit -h, --help show this help message and exit -b BASEDIR, --base=BASEDIR Project Base Directory. Defaults to current directory. -p PACKAGE_DIR, --package-dir=PACKAGE_DIR Package's path. -i I18N_PATH, --i18n-path=I18N_PATH Path to package's i18n dir.
commands: extract Scan source files to gather translatable strings in a .pot file
test.description: CmdLineInterface: no args passed raises SystemExit

test.name: test_GetBoolOptRaisesOptionErrorOnIntsBiggerThanOne
test.description: utils.get_bool_opt: raises OptionError when trying to cast an int >1 to boolean

test.name: test_GetBoolOptRaisesOptionErrorOnLists
test.description: utils.get_bool_opt: raises AttributeError when trying to cast a list to boolean

test.name: test_GetBoolOptRaisesOptionErrorOnRandomString
test.description: utils.get_bool_opt: raises OptionError when trying to cast a random string to boolean

test.description: utils.get_int_opt: raises OptionError when trying to cast to int anything besides ints

test.name: test_GetListOptRaisesOptionErrorOnOtherThenListsTuplesStrings
test.description: utils.get_list_opt: raises OptionError on values other than lists, tuples, strings
